The graph is a straight line of slope 45° for small values of 'F' and straight line parallel to 'F' axis for large 'F'

correctAnswer: The graph is a straight line of slope 45° for small values of 'F' and straight line parallel to 'F' axis for large 'F'

correctAnswer: The number of atoms in the higher energy state are more than the lower energy state

question: In a Graded Index Optical Fibre
options: The Refractive Index of the core remains constant and will be greater than that of the cladding
The Refractive Index of the core remains constant and will be less than that of the cladding
The Refractive Indices of both core and cladding remain constant and are equal
The Refractive Index of the core varies with maximum at the centre and decreases as the radial distance increases from the axis of the core
correctAnswer: The Refractive Index of the core varies with maximum at the centre and decreases as the radial distance increases from the axis of the core

question: Which of the following statements is correct, if (n_e) and (n_h) are the concentrations of the Electrons and Holes respectively
options: In an intrinsic semiconductor, (n_e = n_h) and both these charge carriers contribute to current equally
In p-type semiconductor, (n_e > n_h) and the current due to electrons is more than that of holes
In n-type semiconductor, (n_p > n_e) and current due to holes is more than that of elecrons
In an extrinsic semiconductor, (n_e = n_h) and both these charge carriers contribute to current equally
correctAnswer: In an intrinsic semiconductor, (n_e = n_h) and both these charge carriers contribute to current equally
